ReservationManager - Class in restaurant
Controller class for Reservation objects that holds collections of reservations

create a new Reservation Manager with empty collections of reservations
ReservationManager.AutoCancelTask - Class in restaurant
Inner class of Reservation Manager which defines a task to remove a reservation upon expiry automatically It will be passed to scheduler to be scheduled to run at the time of expiry to remove that reservation
ReservationUI - Class in restaurant
Boundary class to scan user input needed for ReservationManager to process and to create new Reservation
ReservationUI() - Constructor for class restaurant.ReservationUI
 
reservedDineIn() - Method in class restaurant.Restaurant
assign a Table for customers who made reservation before
- if the reservation is not found, treat the customers as a walk-in, no reservation is removed
- if the customers come early (there is a chance that the reserved table is occupied), we let the staff decides whether to assign the reserved table or assign new table, and then remove the reservation subsequently
- if the staff chooses to assign reserved table and the table is available, the table will be assigned
- if the staff chooses to assign reserved table and the table is occupied, the system will assign a new table automatically
- if the staff chooses to assign a new table, then a new table will be assigned - if the customers come on time or no later than the expiry time of the reservation, assign the reserved table as per normal and remove the reservation
resManager - Variable in class restaurant.Restaurant
The object of the Reservation Controller class
restaurant - package restaurant

Restaurant() - Constructor for class restaurant.Restaurant

restoreAutoRemove() - Method in class restaurant.Restaurant

run() - Method in class restaurant.ReservationManager.AutoCancelTask
the task to be executed by the scheduler at given time.
